Title: Being 17
Actors: Sandrine Kiberlain, Kacey Mottet Klein, Corentin Fila, Alexis Loret
Plot: Damien lives with his mother Marianne, a doctor, while his father is on a tour of duty abroad. He is bullied by Thomas, whose mother is ill. The boys find themselves living together when Marianne invites Thomas to come and stay with them.
